statements: SELECT * FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT email_address FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE behavior_track_1 = 'clicked';
SELECT user_id, email_address FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE behavior_track_2 = 'subscribed' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE behavior_track_1 = 'opened' AND behavior_track_2 = 'subscribed';
SELECT DISTINCT behavior_track_1, behavior_track_2 FROM email_marketing_lists;
SELECT * FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, email_address FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE behavior_track_1 = 'click';
SELECT user_id, behavior_track_1, behavior_track_2 FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE email_address LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE behavior_track_1 = 'open' AND behavior_track_2 = 'click';
SELECT user_id, behavior_track_1 FROM email_marketing_lists ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserBehavior WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT email_address, behavior_type FROM UserBehavior WHERE behavior_type = 'CLICK';
SELECT list_name, created_by FROM EmailMarketingLists ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type FROM UserBehavior WHERE user_id = 2 AND behavior_type = 'PURCHASE';
SELECT * FROM EmailMarketingLists WHERE created_by LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM UserBehavior WHERE behavior_type = 'click' ORDER BY behavior_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, email_address FROM UserBehavior WHERE behavior_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY user_id ASC, behavior_timestamp DESC
SELECT list_name, created_by FROM EmailMarketingLists WHERE creation_date > '2021-01-01' AND list_id IN (1, 4, 7)
SELECT * FROM UserBehavior WHERE behavior_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY user_id, behavior_timestamp DESC LIMIT 20
SELECT list_id, list_name FROM EmailMarketingLists WHERE created_by = 'Admin' ORDER BY list_id
SELECT * FROM user_behavior
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'click' ORDER BY behavior_date DESC
SELECT list_name FROM email_list WHERE segment_criteria LIKE '%VIP%'
SELECT user_id, behavior_type FROM user_behavior WHERE behavior_date >= '2022-01-01' AND behavior_date <= '2022-03-31'
SELECT * FROM user_list_mapping INNER JOIN email_list ON user_list_mapping.list_id = email_list.list_id
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_behavior WHERE behavior_type='click' ORDER BY behavior_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT list_name, segment_criteria FROM email_list WHERE list_name LIKE '%Special%' ORDER BY list_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type FROM user_behavior WHERE behavior_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';

SELECT list_name, user_id, behavior_date FROM email_list JOIN user_list_mapping ON email_list.list_id = user_list_mapping.list_id JOIN user_behavior ON user_behavior.user_id = user_list_mapping.user_id WHERE user_behavior.behavior_type = 'open' ORDER BY behavior_date DESC;

SELECT user_id, email, list_name, segment_criteria FROM user_behavior JOIN user_list_mapping ON user_behavior.user_id = user_list_mapping.user_id JOIN email_list ON user_list_mapping.list_id = email_list.list_id;
SELECT * FROM user_behavior WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT email, behavior_type FROM user_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'click';
SELECT list_name, created_date FROM email_lists WHERE list_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, subscription_date FROM email_subscriptions WHERE list_id = 2;
SELECT name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM user_behavior WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT email, COUNT(*) FROM user_behavior GROUP BY email HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT list_name, segment_criteria FROM email_lists WHERE created_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(DISTINCT list_id) AS num_lists FROM email_subscriptions GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_lists > 2;
SELECT campaign_id, name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns ORDER BY start_date ASC, end_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_demographics;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM user_demographics WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM email_activity ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT behavior_type FROM user_behaviors;
SELECT segment_name, user_behavior_type FROM segment_lists WHERE user_behavior_type = 'click';
SELECT * FROM user_demographics;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM user_demographics WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM email_activity ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT segment_id, segment_name, user_behavior_type FROM segment_lists JOIN user_behaviors ON segment_lists.user_behavior_type = user_behaviors.behavior_type;
